theAlchemist:OverhealPower.NAME: Overheal
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you heal for more than your max HP, gain the difference in Regeneration.

theAlchemist:ElementPower.NAME: Element
DESCRIPTIONS: This is a temporary description YEEHAW.

theAlchemist:SpillagePower.NAME: Spillage
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain a potion, use its ability

theAlchemist:TransmutationCirclePower.NAME: Transmutation Circle
DESCRIPTIONS: When you draw a Stage_1_Element or Stage_2_Element, upgrade it.
When you draw any Element, upgrade it.

theAlchemist:SolFormPower.NAME: Sol Form
DESCRIPTIONS: When you draw an Element, reduce its cost by 1.
